subject: Horse Racing
Grand National (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Auroras Encore, a 66-1 long shot, won the Grand National Steeplechase by nine lengths in Aintree, England, in a race shadowed by recent horse deaths.
snippet: Auroras Encore, a 66-1 long shot, won the Grand National Steeplechase by nine lengths in Aintree, England, in a race shadowed by recent horse deaths.
